title.rendered: Large Open Sign for Business and Stores – Ultra Bright LED Open Neon Sign w/ Remote Controlled

content.rendered:
• 【 Inviting Super Bright 】 Large 24 inches X 12 inches. Super bright and eye-catching, much brighter and cost-effective than ordinary LEDs or Neon, excellent visibility even during the day time
  • 【 Flashing or Static Mode 】 Your customer welcoming open sign has static or blinking and scrolling animation modes to attract customers by rendering striking lighting intensity through the dark window even tinted
  • 【 Operation on Fingertips 】 Busy with your business? This wireless remote controlled LED sign can turn on and off or switch to flash option up to 35 feet distance from a remote control
  • 【 Super Energy Efficient 】 SMD 2835 chip LED signs save up to 90% electricity compare with Neon Signs, the long-lasting brightness and color of this professional grade Open LED will not fade over time
  • 【 Complete Set to Display 】 5 foot power cord and 2 hanging chains are ready to install this Open Light for your business such as Bar, Club, Barbershop, Pub, Restaurant, Grocery Shop Store front
  • 【 Not to Block Your View 】 Your LED open sign is large and bright enough to attract customers’ attentions with minimal visual obstacle designed not to block your view of store window
  • 【 50000 Hour Rated LED Life 】 LED open signs have a much longer lifespan than regular Neon lighted open signs because LEDs have no working parts that will burn out

excerpt.rendered: Large Open Sign for Business and Stores – Ultra Bright LED Open Neon Sign w/ Remote Controlled – Animated Flashing Seen Day or Night (24″ x 12″ Oval, Red & Blue)
